author: Kendall Karson
title: Country grows more pessimistic about a return to normalcy post-coronavirus: POLL
description: The country is growing more pessimistic about a timeframe for a return to normalcy, a new ABC News/Ipsos poll shows.
content: The country is growing more pessimistic about a timeframe for a return to normalcy, with ideological allegiance extending to nearly every aspect of the crisis, including how soon Americans believe they will resume some level of regular activities post-coronav… [+5744 chars]
